United Kingdom - cool/temperate.sowing:
Grow in seed trays, and plant out in 4-6 weeks. 				Sow seed at a depth approximately three times the diameter of the seed.
				Best planted at soil temperatures between 12°C and 21°C.
United Kingdom - cool/temperate.companion: Compatible with (can grow beside): Not applicable as celery needs to be close together to encourage blanching.
